import React from 'react'; import "../../App.scss" import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import "../Header/Header.scss"; import bfLogo from "../../assets/logo/Logo-brainflix.svg" import avatar from "../../assets/images/Mohan-muruge.jpg" //In my Header Component, I have placed links to the homepage (with BMX video) on the brainflix logo and links to the upload component on the upload button. function Header() { const submitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault() event.target.reset() } return (
) } export default Header
